what? i'm pro choice, not pro stupidity. by all means, post those up on bulletin boards the hundred yards around the clinic you're allowed to advance to, i'm sure it would change many minds. but as i've stated in the other thread i've posted in here, if people can ignore that and still take the abortion lightly, the should *not* be having children! adoption is not a viable answer because too many people have children they don't want in the first place and are unwilling to take on more. abstinance isn't a viable answer either: just because you're virgin doesn't mean everyone else is or wants to be. and if you'd like to get very technical and cynical, maybe you judeo-christian *******s (and i mean that whole-heartedly based on my experience with them) should team up with the gays and lesbians: imagine that! an entire class of people garunteed NEVER to have an abortion! you'd think they'd be natural allies! emoticon_mad
